ElementEnum.RawValue:
i_all_of_the_following_must_be_present,I - ALL of the following must be present (hemoglobin >10 g/dL; serum calcium <12 mg/dL; urine light chains <4 g/24 hrs; normal bones on radiograph or solitary plasmacytoma; IgG <5 g/dL; IgA <3 g/dL) 
 ii_fitting_neither_stage_i_or_stage_iii,II - fitting neither Stage I or Stage III 
 iii_one_of_the_following_must_be_present,III - one of the following must be present (hemoglobin <8.5 g/dL; serum calcium >12 mg/dL; urine light chains >12 g/24 hrs; advanced lytic bone lesions (>3 lytic lesions); IgG >7 g/dL; IgA >5 g/dL) 
 unknown,Unknown

StructuredValue.Value: I - ALL of the following must be present (hemoglobin >10 g/dL; serum calcium <12 mg/dL; urine light chains <4 g/24 hrs; normal bones on radiograph or solitary plasmacytoma; IgG <5 g/dL; IgA <3 g/dL)
II - fitting neither Stage I or Stage III
III - one of the following must be present (hemoglobin <8.5 g/dL; serum calcium >12 mg/dL; urine light chains >12 g/24 hrs; advanced lytic bone lesions (>3 lytic lesions); IgG >7 g/dL; IgA >5 g/dL)

Field.ElementNote: Conditionality Rule: Inclusion based on patient population being studied.

Field.ElementLabel: What was the International Staging System for Myeloma Stage?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1_beta2_mic_lt_3.5_s._albumin_gteq_3.5,ISS Stage I Plasma Cell Myeloma 
 2_beta2_mic_3.5_lt_5.5_s._albumin_,ISS Stage II Plasma Cell Myeloma 
 3_beta2_mic_gteq_5.5_s._albumin_,ISS Stage III Plasma Cell Myeloma 
 unknown,Unknown

ISS Stage II Plasma Cell Myeloma
ISS Stage III Plasma Cell Myeloma
